body.p: This repository is an upload of an AngularJS project that is set up in WebStorm. The project is divided into the following:

li.p: index.html (and possibly other index files that open different samples) -- the file that implements the app's single page, and that is bound to the data managed by the Angular directives and services
app -- a directory containing the Angular modules that implement 4D
assets -- a directory containing content, styling, and external JS libs

note.p: The following list is generated as a conref. It calls the ConrefService with the following value for the conref attr: jsFunction:buildRefList:Related Links. The ConrefService in turn calls the ExtensionService to execute a function as follows: buildRefList("Related Links"). The result is this list of related links, derived from the TOC entries that lie under this specific topic. This is included here to show an example of dynamic content generation.
